actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the second full week in October of each year as "National Legal Secretaries' Court Observance Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to proclaim the second full week in October of each year as "National Legal Secretaries' Court Observance Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the second full week in October of each year as "National Legal Secretaries' Court Observance Week".
